answerText: The Recognition of Shakuntala [or The Sign of Shakuntala or Abhijnanashakuntalam][10] The Recognition of Shakuntala is a play by this Sanskrit writer who also wrote the poem The Cloud Messenger.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 15 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character of this work loses a ring that is necessary to remove a curse cast on her by Durvasa. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Dushyanta does not allow the title character to be his queen until after he travels through heaven.
